metadata.title: CVE-2024-42160 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:f2fs: check validation of fault attrs in f2fs_build_fault_attr()- It missed to check validation of fault attrs in parse_options(),let's fix to add check condition in f2fs_build_fault_attr().- Use f2fs_build_fault_attr() in __sbi_store() to clean up code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-42160` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-45-generic - 6.8.0-45.45
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-45-generic - 6.8.0-45.45
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-45-generic-64k - 6.8.0-45.45
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1016-aws - 6.8.0-1016.17
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1015-azure - 6.8.0-1015.17
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1015-gcp - 6.8.0-1015.17
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1011-gke - 6.8.0-1011.14
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1013-ibm - 6.8.0-1013.13
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-45-lowlatency - 6.8.0-45.45.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-45-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-45.45.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1013-oracle - 6.8.0-1013.13
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1013-oracle-64k - 6.8.0-1013.13
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1013-oem - 6.8.0-1013.13
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1012-raspi - 6.8.0-1012.13
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1012.19
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-45.45').
linux-aws package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1016.17').
linux-azure package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1015.17').
linux-gcp package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1015.17').
linux-gke package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1011.14').
linux-ibm package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1013.13').
linux-lowlatency package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-45.45.1').
linux-oracle package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1013.13').
linux-oem-6.8 package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1013.13').
linux-raspi package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1012.13').
linux-intel package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1012.19').
linux-raspi-realtime package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-2011.11').
linux-realtime package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.1-1009.9').
